input_email_body:
Subject: Assistance with Data Encryption Backup Failure

The data encryption backup process unexpectedly failed. This might be due to an outdated Bitdefender antivirus You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. I attempted to update Bitdefender and restart the system, but the issue persists. My name is Liu Wei.
